Method(s)/Technology(ies): Kinetic interaction of microparticles in solution (KIMS)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Roche Diagnostics Amphetamines II Assay for COBAS INTEGRA analyzers to detect amphetamines and methamphetamines in urine by EIA/KIMS technology
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic test for qualitative and semiquantitative detection of amphetamines and methamphetamines in human urine on COBAS INTEGRA systems at cutoff concentrations of 300, 500, and 1000 ng/mL when calibrated with d-methamphetamine; preliminary analytical test result requiring GC/MS confirmation.
